mapper.select: select rownum, user_id,bo_id,c_content,c_date,usage from(select rownum rn, user_id,bo_id,c_content,c_date,usage from (select rownum rn, user_id,bo_id,c_content,c_date,usage from bcommv where usage=#{usage} order by bo_id desc) a where rownum <=(${page}*10)) b where b.rn>(${page}-1)*10
select * from bcomment where bo_id=#{boId} order by 1 desc
mapper.insert: insert into bcomment(co_no, user_id, bo_id, co_content, co_date) values(bcomm_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{boId}, #{coContent}, sysdate)
